Articles.Content: Can anyone please help me with a guide to change the profile picture? I've clicked "edit avatar", but that hasn't worked. Help would be appreciated.

Avatars are restricted for new users until they have a few posts (either 3 or 5, don't remember which it is offhand). This restriction is mainly to prevent any spammers that get through registration from using ads as avatars. Once you have a couple of more posts you will be able to set an avatar for yourself. 

Also, this is more of a forum-related question, I'm moving the thread to the Kerbal Network forum where such issues are discussed.

As its name suggests, the Gameplay Discussion is for topics about playing the game itself. Anything else gets put into more appropriate subforums, to make it easier for other people to find it later.

If many off-topic or irrelevant threads were left in GD simply to get maximum views, then it would be very difficult to find threads specifically to do with gameplay.
Thank you for the informative posts. I hope to contribute to the KSP Forum community!
